    • Method Detail

      • RequestTranslation

        public void RequestTranslation(java.lang.String languageToTranslateTo,
                               java.lang.String textToTranslate)
        Performs an HTTP GET request to the Yandex.Translate service

      • performRequest

        private void performRequest(java.lang.String languageToTranslateTo,
                            java.lang.String textToTranslate)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            JSONException
        This is the actual request to the Yandex.Translate service. It opens a https connection to their web based API and parses the JSON response.
        Parameters:
        languageToTranslateTo - the language that the text will be translated into.
        textToTranslate - the word or sentence to translate.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the connection is not successful.
        JSONException - if the JSON response cannot be parsed.

      • getResponseContent

        private static java.lang.String getResponseContent(java.net.HttpURLConnection connection)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        This method reads from a stream based on the passed connection
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to read from
        Returns:
        the contents of the stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it cannot read from the http connection

      • GotTranslation

        public void GotTranslation(java.lang.String responseCode,
                           java.lang.String translation)
        Event indicating that a request has finished and has returned data (translation).
        Parameters:
        responseCode - the response code from the server
        translation - the response content from the server
